```{python}
experiments_of_interest = None
agenda_name_baseline = '003_a_bit_more_advanced_schedules_only_2020_06_12T21_01_45_merge_2020_06_19T16_23_16_baseline_2020_06_23T20_36_43'
experiment_base_directory_baseline = f'../rsp-data/{agenda_name_baseline}'
experiment_data_directory_baseline = f'../rsp-data/{experiment_base_directory_baseline}/{EXPERIMENT_DATA_SUBDIRECTORY_NAME}'

experiment_results_list_baseline = load_and_expand_experiment_results_from_data_folder(
    experiment_data_folder_name=experiment_data_directory_baseline,
    nonify_problem_and_results=True
)
experiment_data_baseline: pd.DataFrame = convert_list_of_experiment_results_analysis_to_data_frame(experiment_results_list_baseline)
experiment_results_list = experiment_results_list_baseline
```

```{python}
import pandas as pd
experiment_data = pd.DataFrame(
    [exp._asdict() for exp in experiment_results_list],
```

# Visualize effect of SEQ heuristics (SIM-167)

```{python}
from rsp.hypothesis_one_data_analysis import hypothesis_one_analysis_visualize_computational_time_comparison
agenda_name_comparison = '003_a_bit_more_advanced_schedules_only_2020_06_12T21_01_45_merge_2020_06_19T16_23_16_with_SEQ_2020_06_24T04_10_47'
experiment_base_directory_comparison = f'../rsp-data/{agenda_name_comparison}'
experiment_data_directory_comparison = f'{experiment_base_directory_comparison}/{EXPERIMENT_DATA_SUBDIRECTORY_NAME}'

experiment_results_list_comparison = load_and_expand_experiment_results_from_data_folder(
    experiment_data_folder_name=experiment_data_directory_comparison,
    nonify_problem_and_results=True
)
experiment_data_comparison: pd.DataFrame = convert_list_of_experiment_results_analysis_to_data_frame(experiment_results_list_comparison)


```

```{python}
hypothesis_one_analysis_visualize_computational_time_comparison(
    experiment_data_baseline=experiment_data_baseline,
    experiment_data=experiment_data_comparison,
    experiment_data_baseline_suffix=f'_{agenda_name_baseline}',
    experiment_data_suffix=f'_{agenda_name_comparison}'
)
```
